name: generatequiz
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool quizy_api.
Tool description: The Quizy API is a powerful tool that allows developers to create and customize quizzes programmatically. With this API, you can generate a wide variety of quizzes on different topics, ranging from educational quizzes for students to fun quizzes for entertainment purposes.

The API provides a simple and intuitive interface to generate quizzes based on parameters such as the number of questions, difficulty level, topic, and format. It leverages a vast repository of questions and answers, ensur...
API description: This endpoint will return you the 5 questions, options, correct answer and explaination for the quiz topic you provide.

topic.description: The topic for which the quiz needs to be generated.
